text: Ne bakholela Nyasaye abuleka khumimela echiayaloonga, nende mumiruko, nebaboolanga mbu; Ino niya Nyasaye khukhuboola khwabu butswa, Ne ino niyabalia bakhutsokasinjia nabo Nyasayeâ€ Kho bilia ebisuubililwe abanyasaye babu shibiulanga khu Nyasaye tawe, ne ebisuubililwe Nyasaye biulanga khuba Nyasaye babu. Ni amabii muno akababusinjia
